roleOverview: Product Designers bridge user needs and business goals to design end-to-end digital products from discovery to delivery.
requiredSkills: Prototyping in Figma and usability testing
Cross-functional collaboration with PM and engineering
beginnerStage: Learn UX fundamentals, product thinking, and user journeys
Design simple app flows and clickable prototypes in Figma
Document process in portfolio case studies
intermediateStage: Run discovery interviews and validate assumptions
Design measurable improvements for activation and retention
Collaborate with developers during implementation and QA
advancedStage: Own product areas end-to-end with outcome metrics
Lead design strategy and experimentation roadmaps
Scale design systems and mentor team members
realWorldProjects: SaaS onboarding redesign with funnel improvements
Subscription management UX for reduced churn
Design system foundation and component governance
salaryInsights: Product design compensation increases with ownership scope, business impact, and ability to ship user-centric solutions at scale.
